name: Scribble Jam's Adventure
description:
Embark on a 6 level quest to collect all your notes so that you can make all 6 of your great desktop items. Make sure to check in the settings after collecting all 18 notes for a Great suprise.

controls:

AD - move

W - Jump

Space(Press) - dash toward mouse

Space(Hold) - slow time and dash toward mouse

Esc - Open Pause Menu
